items.sentence: You're the one Tom wants to take to the dance.
It's too bad that Tom isn't going to be there.
I was expecting something like this to happen.
Tom told me he was going to leave early today.
Tom speaks both French and English quite well.
Tom wants to apologize to Mary for doing that.
If we hadn't done that, someone else would've.
Tom is leaving for Australia tomorrow morning.
Tom immediately did what Mary asked him to do.
I knew that something bad was going to happen.
